GSP32vvmanmhu:6: 1) vivādādhyāsitaṃ karma prayatnādhārajaṃ karmatvāt, yatkarma tat prayatnādhārajaṃ yathā - sampratipannaṃ karma, tathā vivādādhyāsitaṃ karma, tasmātprayatnādhārajam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:7: 2) vivādādhyāsitaṃ mūrtaṃ prayatnādhārajam, paramāṇuvyatiriktatve sati mūrtatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:11: etena vyāptidarśanakāle karmatvakāryatvāderaṅkaratajjananādau kevalasyāpi darśanād vyāptaniścaya iti parākṛtam, upādhisadbhāvasyā 'nirūpitatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:16: 4) kiṃ ca vivādhyāsite pṛthivyudake prayatnavatā ghṛte, gurutve satyapātitvāt karatalāmalakavat
GSP32vvmanmhu:20: tasyāpi sādhane bādhaḥ --- na hi draṣṭurddaṣṭerviparilopo vidyate (bṛha
GSP32vvmanmhu:23: na ca tatrāpi kāraṇasadbhāva upādhiḥ, tasyāpi sādhanādbādhāyā abhāvāt /

GSP32vvmanmhu:30: (ta saṃ 282) iti tvayaivābhyupagateḥ, mama sutarāmiṣṭatvāt, tvanmate svaprakāśatvena sarvajñānānāṃ pramātvāt, mama tu prakṛte 'vipratipatteśca
GSP32vvmanmhu:33: na cātraitadvyatiriktatvamupādhiḥ, tava vyarthaviśeṣaṇatvāt, mama nityeṣvapi sambhavāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:45: prakāśate vivādapadamiti nātra prakaraṇasamatvam, ubhayavādisiddhāśrayasya durnirūpatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:51: indriyaṃ dravyagrāhakaṃ na bhavati, indriyatvād, rasanavaditi tu vyāptyasiddhisvarūpāsiddhidṛṣṭāntāsiddhiduṣṭatvādasādhanam
GSP32vvmanmhu:61: na ca piṇḍasyevopādhitvam, tatsamānakṣaṇānāṃ rūpādīnāmapi tathābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:65: kalpanayā tatsiddhyabhyupagame vastuno 'sattvena tanmūlasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāsattvaprāptau viśvāsattvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:67: sahakāriṇāmeva hetutvamastviti (cenna) teṣāmeva caramatvaniyame tadupayogaḥ syāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:70: krameṇa kāryakaraṇārhaṃ sthiraṃ tadviparītaṃ kṣaṇikamiti vipratipatterviṣaya udghāṭanīyaḥ
GSP32vvmanmhu:73: rasa udakārambhako na bhavati, rūpaṃ teja ārambhakaṃ na bhavati, sparśo vāyujanako na bhavati, śabdo dravyārambhako na bhavati,
GSP32vvmanmhu:75: na cātraupādhikaśaṅkā 'pyasti gandhatvasya, tasyābhāve 'pi gurutvādiṣu sādhyasya darśanāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:76: na ca śabdavyatiriktamupādhi caramasyānumānasya, nāpi prathamasya rasavyatiriktatvaṃ prayojakam, tadvyatiriktasyāpi saṃyogāderudakārambhakatvadarśanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:80: na ca vyarthaviśeṣaṇatvam, kāryatvamātrasya dhvaṃsādiṣu vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:85: tathā ca vyarthaviśeṣaṇatvam, prativādino vyāvṛttyabhāvāt, manasi vyabhicāraśca /
GSP32vvmanmhu:93: na ca sopādhikatvaṃ syāt, mahāpṛthivītvasya rūpādau sādhyāvyāpakatvāt /

GSP32vvmanmhu:105: hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patireka āsīt (ṛ saṃ
GSP32vvmanmhu:116: na ca pārthivaparamāṇutvamupādhiḥ, tadabhāve 'pi sādhyasyānugamadarśanena dvyaṇukādiṣu samavyāptikatvābhāvāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:118: tañca pūrvānumānena sādhayituṃ śakyate iti na kaścid doṣaḥ /

GSP32vvmanmhu:144: arūpaṃ śarīraṃ vāyavīyam, mūrtatve sati tvagindriyānyatve ca sati vyāptyā
GSP32vvmanmhu:155: na codbhūtasparśābhāvo mahattve sati prayojakaḥ, vāristhite tejasi abhāvāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:156: na ca tasyāpi pratyakṣatvam, uṣṇaṃ jalamiti vibhramānupapatteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:158: na ca vāyurasmadādipratyakṣaḥ, anudbhūtarūpānadhikaraṇatve sati udbhūtasparśādhikaraṇatvādghaṭavaditi sāmpratam, paramāṇau vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:159: na ca mahattve satīti viśeṣaṇīyam, pratyakṣasāmagrīsadbhāvasyopādheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:172: 2) anye tu śabdo 'ṣṭadravyātiriktadravyāśritaḥ, tadvṛtau bādhakopapattau guṇatvādvyatirekeṇa rūpavaditi bruvate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:176: na ca sarvāvinābhāvānāmucchedaḥ, yatra vyatirekasya bhāvarūpatvaṃ
GSP32vvmanmhu:192: asarvagatatvasya rūpādiṣvapi saṃbhavāt, dravyatvena viśeṣaṇe viśeṣyavaiyarthyāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:193: sparśavattvasya prayojaktve manaso 'parimāṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ, manasi ca tadabhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:197: na ca sāvayatvamupādhiḥ, tasya maduktahetugarbhitatvād, dravyate sati ārabhyatvasya tattvāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:201: upādhibhedācca bheda ityanarthabījam, ātmāntaḥkaraṇādīnāmapi tathābhāve virodhābhāvat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:211: na ca sādhye bahuvacanakṣepaṇātiprasaṅga iti vācyam, dṛṣṭāntāsiddheḥ bhūṣaṇasya saṃkhyānabhyupagamena manogatatvasya dūrāpāstatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:212: na mano manasā saṃyujyate nityadravyatvāditi sādhane dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:215: tathā ca vyomaśivaḥ-- `parakīyena ca manasā sūkṣmaśarīrasthaṃ manaḥ
GSP32vvmanmhu:218: na ca vimatipadaṃ viśeṣaguṇarahitadravyābhyāṃ na janyate,
GSP32vvmanmhu:226: tasya ca ko viṣaya iti cintāyāṃ paraśarīraparātmādiṣvatiprasaṅganirākaraṇārthaṃ yatra svayaṃ samavetaḥ, sa eva tasya viṣaya iti vaktavyamiti sthite ---
GSP32vvmanmhu:231: avasthāviśeṣavataḥ śarīrasya pakṣatvānna doṣaḥ, tathā śarīratvāt mṛtaśarīravaditi vācyam
GSP32vvmanmhu:232: vivādādhyāsitaḥ prāṇo na jñānādhāraḥ, kāryatvādvāyutvāt, prāṇatvāt suṣuptāvasthaprāṇavat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:234: na ca yogyānulabdhibādhaḥ, prayatnādhārasyeva bodhādhārasya yogyatvenāpi
GSP32vvmanmhu:237: śarīrasya tu yogyānupalabdhyā bādha iti cet /
GSP32vvmanmhu:238: kiṃ cātaḥ? tasyaiva bodhādhāratvāttadabhāve bodhādhārasyāpi abhāva iti cet
GSP32vvmanmhu:240: vyāptatvānnaivamiti cet, tarhyanumānena bādho vakyavyaḥ, tatra cāśrayanirūpaṇaṃ durghaṭam
GSP32vvmanmhu:241: vivādādhyāsitaṃ bodhādhārajaṃ na bhavati, śarīrajanyatvādākāśavaditi prāgeva vyudastam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:244: tatrāpi suṣuptaśarīrakriyādiṣu vyabhicāraparihārāya jāgrata iti viśeṣaṇaprāpte, atrāpyudāsīnasyākasmikanipatitakriyāparihārārthaṃ kurvata iti vaktavyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:248: nirupādhikasya sambandhasya vyāptitvenopādhibhaṅge jāte, kvacitsambandhe ca dṛṣṭe, anyatra kevalasya hetordarśanamapi na doṣamāvahatītyavocamityalam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:250: anye tu sarvārthavittiṣu grāhakatvena ātmasiddhiriti bruvate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:251: tadasat, ātmano 'pi cākṣuṣatvaprasaṅgāt, tajjanitajñāne bhāsamānatvasyaiva tattvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:252: yadi ca nīrūpadravyasyāpi cākṣuṣatvam, tadā nabhaso 'pi tathātvaprasaṅgāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:256: tathā hi --- asti tāvat saugatatacchiṣyāṇāmanātmavāsanāto viṣayebhyo
GSP32vvmanmhu:258: na ca te pramāṇamūle eveti niyamaḥ, rajjusarpavivekāgrahaṇādvā vibhramādvā śuktirajatavivekāgrahaṇādvā vibhramādvānayoranudayaprasaṅgāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:259: na ca te na nivṛttī, nāpi pravṛttī vā /
GSP32vvmanmhu:260: na cājñānupūrvikā nivṛttiḥ pravṛttirvā svasthasya saṃbhavati /
GSP32vvmanmhu:261: na cātmajñāne teṣāṃ tadupapadyate, tathānabhyāsadaśāyāṃ ko 'hamitya(dhyavasāyānupapattirniścīyate), anadhyavasāye 'tiprasaṅgāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:262: kiṃ ca kaḥ punastatpratibhāse sambandhārthaḥ? karmatvam, tadatiriktaṃ vā?
GSP32vvmanmhu:267: kiṃ ca yogināṃ viyuktāvasthāyāṃ paramāṇurūpādiviṣayacākṣuṣajñānasya pakṣīkāre bhavatāmāśrayaikadeśāsiddhaḥ, anyathāsmākamanaikāntaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:268: na ca mānasapratyakṣatve tatsāmagrayāḥ sarvadā sannihitatvāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:269: suṣuptāvasthāyāmapyātmajñānaprasaṅgaḥ, ahaṃ śarīramitivivekāgrahaṇādiṣu ahaṃjñānotpattau bāhyendriyavyatiriktakārakagrāmasyaiva tvayāpi
GSP32vvmanmhu:274: sa ca jñānāśrayo na tu vijñānātmakaḥ, na hi draṣṭurdṛṣṭerviparilopo
GSP32vvmanmhu:279: na ca rāhoḥ śira itivadupacaritatvam, mukhye bādhakābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:280: na cādvaitaśrutirbādhikā, viparyaye pratyuta tasya bhedagrāhakatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:281: na ca tatra tasya sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti vācyam, sāmarthye sati virodhābhāvāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:286: tathā hi -- ghaṭasaṃyuktena cakṣuṣā janitaṃ jñānaṃ ghaṭamevāvagāhate nārthāntaram, asambaddhatvāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:287: kiñcāsti tāvadiyaṃ prasiddhiḥ, 'ata eva vyavaharāmaḥ' itivacanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:292: na ca bhedānavasthā bādhikā, bhedāntaraprasaktau mūlābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:297: dṛṣṭāntabhedavighāte tvanumānānutthānameva, upajīvyasya prabalatvena tenaiva bādhāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:302: asato bhāsamānāyogāt, bādhāyogātsataḥ, atra cobhayaṃ dṛśyate iti cet, na;
GSP32vvmanmhu:305: dvitīye sata iti ko 'rthaḥ? kiṃ sattāyuktasya, āhosvidabādhitasya,
GSP32vvmanmhu:306: brahmāsvarūpasya vā? prathame sattāyuktasyābādhitatvena vyāptiḥ kutraḥ
GSP32vvmanmhu:307: dṛṣṭā? prapañcasya bādhyatvād, brahmaṇo nirdhamakatvena sattābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:318: na ca `prakṛṣṭaḥ prakāśaḥ savitā' itivat śabdadvayenāpi eka evārthaḥ pratipādyate iti yuktam, dṛṣṭāntāsiddheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:320: prakāśaśabdasya prakāśatvabalāt, anyathā tatrāpi paryanuyogasya tulyatvāt

GSP32vvmanmhu:327: 'aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' (chā u 8.12.1) iti vacanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:340: na hi siddhasya sampādanāya kaścid yatate 'tra /

GSP32vvmanmhu:342: na caikanityasukhavāde kāraṇopādānaṃ ghaṭate, tadviśeṣe tu kaiva kathā? na caikasyaivātiśayānatiśayau śaṅkārhau, ekatvavyāghātāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:343: avacchedanivṛttyarthaṃ kāraṇaviśeṣopādānamiti vaktavyam, tatra ca duḥkhābhāvasya sukhatvenānubhavasya niratiśayatvāt, tadanupapattiriti yo 'yaṃ doṣa uktaḥ, sa samānaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:345: na ca tathāvidhasya muktau kathāsambhava iti /

GSP32vvmanmhu:360: tayorātmanormadhye eko = bhoktā pippalaṃ svādu atti = sukhaviśeṣaṃ bhuṅkte /
GSP32vvmanmhu:361: anaśnan anyaḥ = abhoktā īśvaraḥ abhicākaśīti = sarvato 'tyarthaṃ prakāśate iti vispaṣṭo jīvabrahmaṇorbhedaḥ
GSP32vvmanmhu:362: ajāmekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīḥ prajāḥ sṛjamānāṃ sarūpāḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:366: kathaṃ tarhi `neha nānāsti kiṃcana' (bṛha 4.4.19) iti, `mṛtyoḥ sa
GSP32vvmanmhu:367: mṛtyumāpnoti, ya iha nāneva paśyati' (kaṭha 4.10) iti ca, (liṅgāt)

GSP32vvmanmhu:383: tatra na mūrtatvamupādhiḥ, rūpādau tadabhāve 'pi sādhyānugamadarśanāt /

GSP32vvmanmhu:410: etenāvibhu nityadravyatvādityanenāmahattvasādhane sādhyavyāpakatvāt sparśavattvaṃ nopādhiriti śrīvallabhoktaṃ nirastam /

GSP32vvmanmhu:463: cet, tatra kimālokābhāvaprayogo 'sti, na vā? asti cet, tamaḥśabdaprayogo
GSP32vvmanmhu:465: atha yathā jvālāyā āśutaravināśitvena madhye vināśe vidyamāne 'pi
GSP32vvmanmhu:466: tatsadṛśajvālotpattyā tirohitatvānna nāśavyavahāraḥ, tadāloke satyālokāntarābhāvasya tirodhānānna tadabhāvavyavahāra iti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:468: tattulyaṃ te tarkakarkaśamaterapyuktaparihāraścakṣurālokāsahakṛtaṃ rūpigrāhakaṃ dravyagrāhakendriyatvāttvagvaditi vādinaḥ kālagrāhakaghrāṇenānaikāntikaṃ vyarthaviśeṣaṇatā ca /
GSP32vvmanmhu:469: cakṣurālokanirapekṣaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhṇāti, indriyatvāditi sādhane ghrāṇena
GSP32vvmanmhu:471: na hi tava tathāvidhaṃ tama eveti lakṣaṇaṃ kālāderapi ālokanirapekṣendriyagrāhyatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:476: yaditthaṃ na bhavati, taditthamapi na bhavati, yathāloka eva /

GSP32vvmanmhu:548: guṇādāvabhedavyavahāra iti cenna, vyavahāramātrādarthāsiddheḥ, tasya gauṇasyāpi bahuśo darśanāt

GSP32vvmanmhu:551: samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇayorabhāvāt, nimittakāraṇamātrādevotpattistu tatsiddhau satyāṃ kalpanīyā, apratītestadasiddheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:552_0: 3) yadyapyapekṣābuddhivaijātyasamavāyād dvitvatritvadivyavahārāṇāmapi bhedasamuccayo na saṃkaramāpādayati, tathāpyananusaṃhitavaijātyādīnāṃ
GSP32vvmanmhu:552_1: bālagopālādīnāṃ dvāviti vyavahāro 'yaṃ na tannibandhanaḥ dvyaṇukaparimāṇaṃ
GSP32vvmanmhu:561: teṣāṃ jñānaprāgabhāvena vyabhicāraḥ --- guṇatve satīti viśeṣaṇe
GSP32vvmanmhu:572: na ca sparśavattvamūrtatve upādhī, pavanapārthivaparamāṇau vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:576: adviṣṭha iti dviṣṭhaguṇatvāvāntarajātirahita iti boddhavyam, anyathā ekatvena siddhasādhanatā
GSP32vvmanmhu:577: 2) tathā vyavahāreṇāpi sādhanīyam --- asti tāvadayaṃ mahān, ayaṃ mahāniti vyavahāraḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:590: na ca pradhvaṃse vyabhicāraḥ, prāgabhāvapratiyogitvasya bhāvatve satīti
GSP32vvmanmhu:592: na cātropādhiśaṅkāpyadhirohati, vispaṣṭaśca ghaṭau saṃyuktāviti pratyayaḥ
GSP32vvmanmhu:610: asamavāyikāraṇatve satīti viśeṣaṇe kevalasaṃyogārambhakeṇa saṃyogena vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:612: na ca saṃyogavyatiriktāsamavāyikāraṇatvāditi saṃyogasyaivāsamavāyikāraṇatvaṃ pratīyate iti bādhitaviṣayatvam, bhavatāṃ karmaṇaḥ karmāsamavāyikāraṇatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:613: na caivaṃ prathamānumāne siddhasādhyatā, mandagatau tadabhāvāt vyatiriktāsiddheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:618: na ca saṃyogābhāvo nimittam, saṃyoganāśe eva kāraṇabhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:619: na ca karmaṇaḥ tatra kāraṇatvam, guṇānāṃ karmavināśyatvādarśanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:621: na ca vibhāgavināśyo 'pi na bhavati, tasmādeveti sāmpratam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:631: 4) anye tu dravyārambhakasaṃyogavirodhivibhāgotpattikāle nāvayavakarma ākāśādideśād vibhāgārambhakam, karmatvāditi bruvate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:632: tadasat, ākāśadeśena vibhāgamārabhate karmatvādityapi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:636: uttarasaṃyogādvināśaḥ paścādapi kathaṃ vibhāgapratyayānuvṛtterapi na vācyam, pratyayasyaivāsiddheḥ, śabdaprayogasya cānyathāpyupapatteḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:642: 1) vivādapadaṃ paramāṇuvṛttyadviṣṭhaguṇajanakam, paramāṇavo vā kāryavṛttyadviṣṭhaguṇajanakā mūrttatvāt, pārthivaparamāṇuvadghaṭavacceti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:643: vivādapadaṃ svārabdhadravye guṇajanakam, dravyatve sati dravyārambhakatvādīśvaravat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:663: 2) prabhākaramate vivādapadaṃ na mānasapratyakṣaṃ jñānatvāditi na
GSP32vvmanmhu:664: sāmpratam, sarvamuktipakṣe dṛṣṭāntāsiddheḥ, anyasminnapi prabhākarasya sarvadā ekatve niścāyakābhāvāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:665: na ca ghaṭaṃ jānāmītyatra kalpanālāghavādekameva jñānaṃ kalpanīyam ---
GSP32vvmanmhu:666: ityarthāpattyupanyāso doṣaḥ syāt, na hi pareṇānekatvasādhane sopanyastā /
GSP32vvmanmhu:672: na ca jñānaṃ mānasapratyakṣaṃ na bhavati, jñānatvāditi sāmpratam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:677: atha kecidakhyātiṃ samarthayanti, vivādapadaṃ rajataviṣayaṃ rajatajñānatvāditi bruvate
GSP32vvmanmhu:678: te tu praṣṭavyāḥ--- kimidaṃ rajatajñānaṃ nāma? 1 rajatasya jñānaṃ rajatajñānam? 2 rajataṃ tajjñānaṃ ca rajatajñānamiti vā? 3
GSP32vvmanmhu:679: rajataśabdollekhi jñānaṃ vā? 4 rajatārthinaḥ pravṛttihetubhūtaṃ jñānaṃ vā?
GSP32vvmanmhu:687: yacca vimataṃ jñānaṃ yathārthaṃ jñānatvāditi bruvate,
GSP32vvmanmhu:692: bālakasya svātmani vivekāgrahaṇamātrātpravṛttiṃ paśyata uttamavṛddhavākyaprayogānantaraṃ pravarttamānamadhyamavṛddhapravṛtterapi tanmātrapūrvakatvakalpanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:694: tatra ca śabdasya kāraṇatvamiti vadato 'bhyupagatasiddhāntabhaṅgaḥ, tasya ca pravṛttimātreṇaiva kalpanābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:708: tena cāsmaduktāvāntarabhedasyābhyupagatatvādbhāsarvajñena sahāsmākaṃ nāsti vipratipattiriti nātra prapañcyate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:716: anyathātiprasaṅgāditi cet, nātiprasaṅgo hi bādhakaḥ syāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:718: ātmā jñātavya iti vākyaprasiddho yogajo dharmaḥ sarvadarśitvādiphalakaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:719: na ca nāsau dharmakalpakaḥ, tena vinānupapatterabhāvāditi sāmpratam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:721: yadāha bhagavān svayameva-- `śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ gehe yogabhraṣṭo 'bhijāyate'
GSP32vvmanmhu:728: (4.1 syādetat --) anumitau kiṃ pramāṇamiti cet, pratyakṣamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:729: bhavati hi vahnimān parvata iti jñānamiti hi dūradeśasthasya kasyāpi matiḥ
GSP32vvmanmhu:730: tathāpi tena tasyānumititvaṃ kathamavagamyate iti mā vocaḥ, pratyakṣatve'
GSP32vvmanmhu:732_0: tatkāraṇānumāne kiṃ pramāṇamityapi na vaktavyam, tatkiṃ pramāṇamātraṃ siddham, yena viśeṣe praśnaḥ syāt? tatsiddhau cānena
GSP32vvmanmhu:735: vyāpterabhāvāt, siddhāyāṃ vā jñātumaśakyatvāt, na, nirupādhikasambandhasya vyāptitvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:736: kaḥ punarupādhiriti cet, yena vinā yayoḥ sahabhāvādarśanaṃ tatra yena
GSP32vvmanmhu:738: dṛṣṭāntamātravyāpako vā, sādhanavyāpakatve sati sādhyavyāpako vā /
GSP32vvmanmhu:747: sādhye viśeṣaṇasyopādānamanvayini dūṣaṇam, vyatirekiṇi tu tadabhāvasya
GSP32vvmanmhu:748: sādhanatvenopayoge tasya vyavacchedakatve nopayoga iti viśeṣaṇavaiyarthyam
GSP32vvmanmhu:763: siddhasādhyatāyāśca parihārārthamāśrayajñānasya ca prathamamākāṃkṣitatvāt prathamataḥ pratijñāvacanam
GSP32vvmanmhu:765: kāraṇamātrasiddhau viśeṣe jijñāsāyāṃ satyāmākāṃkṣāparyālocanayā hetumātrasyaiva vacanam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:768: tathā hi śabdo 'nityaḥ kāryatvād, yatkāryaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:773: anyathā hetumātrameva prayoktavyaṃ syād, viduṣāṃ viśiṣṭārthasyārthādeva pratīteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:776: prativādinā hi sādhanajijñāsā kṛtā kiṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:783: sambhave vā vastuno dvyātmakatvaṃ ko nivārayet? nirupādhikasya sādhyaparityāge svabhāvaparityāgaprasaṅgāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:784: tadevaṃ sthite rūpadvaye, tatpratipādanārthaṃ vacanadvayameva vaktavyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:786: tasmādyatkāryam, tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ, kāryaśca śabda ityanvayini /
GSP32vvmanmhu:787: yannityam, tadakāryaṃ yathā vyoma, kāryaśca śabda iti vyatirekiṇi /
GSP32vvmanmhu:796: pakṣavipakṣayoreva vartamāno heturviruddhaḥ, nityaḥ śabdaḥ kāryatvāditi /
GSP32vvmanmhu:799: nanu sādhyaviparītagāmitā kvacidvyabhicarati, yenānaupādhikatve samarthaṃ syādato viśiṣṭaṃ na dūṣaṇamiti cet /
GSP32vvmanmhu:800: tanna, jalpavādayorhi parasādhanaṃ nivartya svapakṣe sādhanaṃ vācyam, ato lāghavāya viśiṣṭopanyāsaḥ
GSP32vvmanmhu:806: sa kaḥ? anityaḥ śabdaḥ, prameyatvāditi niścitaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:807: mano vibhu, sarvadā sparśarahitadravyatvāditi śaṅkitaḥ, sopādhikatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:812: na hi kālātyayāpadiṣṭānaikāntikatvaṃ nāma samuditamasti dūṣaṇam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:814: ārṣasadbhāve kiṃ pramāṇamiti cet, pratyakṣamiti brumaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:817: na caitadatiriktaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nāma yat sādhanīyamavaśiṣyate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:821_0: nanu jñānāvisaṃvāditvagrāhakapratyekṣaṇa tatpūrvakābādhitatatpravṛttibhyāṃ tajjñānaviṣayīkṛtārthasya yathārthasya kriyākāritvena
GSP32vvmanmhu:821_1: bādhitaviṣayatvādanumānasyaiva durbalatvamiti cet, samaḥ samādhiḥ pratibhātvāviśeṣe 'pi kathamekasya saṃvāditvam, aparasya
GSP32vvmanmhu:821_2: visaṃvāditvamiti cet, na, aparokṣatvāviśeṣe 'pi pratyakṣasya kasyacitsaṃvāditvaṃ kasyaciditi kutaḥ? avāntaravaijātyāditi
GSP32vvmanmhu:825: kathaṃ punarasyāḥ parokṣatvamiti cet, anumiterapi parokṣatā katham?
GSP32vvmanmhu:832: yathārthasya pramāṇabhāve nāsti vipratipattiḥ, parairapi tasya samyaganubhavatvābhyupagamāt, tārkikairapi yathārthajñānatvasya tatrānirākaraṇāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:835: ayameva ca bhāṣyakartturabhiprāya, anyathā pramāṇamadhye tatpaṭhanamasaṅgataṃ syāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:840: nanu tato 'tiriktānyapi śabdādīni santīti cet, na aprasiddheḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:841: nadyāstīre pañca phalāni santīti vākyādarthapratyayo jāyate iti cet, atra kasya kāraṇatvamiti vibhāvyatām--- na pratyakṣasya, arthasyāvispaṣṭatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:843: na hi nadyāstīre pañca phalāni santīti vākyena nadītīraphalasambandhasyāvyabhicaritaḥ sambandhaḥ, anāptavākye tadabhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:848: yatra tu taduktasyāpi vyabhicāraḥ kvacit, tatra tadvyatiriktatve satītyapi
GSP32vvmanmhu:850: yatra tu vyabhicārasthalaṃ syāt, tatra nārthaniścayaḥ, kintu sandeha eva,
GSP32vvmanmhu:878: tatsaṃpradāyāvicchede satyasmaryamāṇakartṛkatvāditi tu mama? tava? uta yasya kasya sādhāraṇyena veti? prathamatṛtīyacaturtheṣvasiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:880: ata eva madanumāne ... {One line lost in the MS.} anyathā siddhasādhanatvādakāryatvaṃ copādhiḥ
GSP32vvmanmhu:882: upamānaṃ tu madīyā gauranena sadṛśīti gosadṛśagavayamālokayato 'numānameva
GSP32vvmanmhu:883: kathamiti cet, bhavati hi pūrvaṃ gavi gavayasādṛśyamityanumitiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:891_1: ca sādṛśyasyopalakṣaṇatve nirṇīte tadeva vākyaṃ gavayapadasya gavayatvanimittatvaṃ bodhayati gavayaśabdaḥ gavayatvavācakaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:900_0: pramāṇadvayavirodho 'pi sāvakāśānavakāśayoḥ sāvakāśasya viṣayasaṃkoca iti vyāptidarśanavato gehānupalabdhiṃ niravakāśāṃ paśyatastadvirodhijīvanavākyaṃ
GSP32vvmanmhu:901: śrutārthāpattistu na śaṅkāmapyārohati, vākyamantareṇa vākyānupapatterabhāvāt na hi pīno devadatto divā na bhuṃkte' iti vākyaṃ `rātrau bhuṃkte' iti vākyena vinānupapannam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:902_0: śābdī hyākāṃkṣā śabdenaiva paripūryate, na hi pacatīti padaṃ pratyakṣādinā nirākāṃkṣamapi tu odanapadeneti cet, na, asmin
GSP32vvmanmhu:902_1: vākye ākāṃkṣāyogyatayorabhāvāt kriyākārakayoḥ sampūrṇatvāt pīnatvaṃ bhojanena vinā 'nupapannam, bhojanakāryatvāditi cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:904: na ca so 'pyasti traikālikabhojananiṣedhe hi sa syāt, na hyabhuktvā pīnaḥ
GSP32vvmanmhu:912: api ca keyamākāṃkṣā nāma? jijñāseti cet, sā tu kutaḥ?
GSP32vvmanmhu:914: na caivaṃ śabdavilopaprasaṅgaḥ, iṣṭatvāt, tasya vākyānumāne 'ntarbhāvo
GSP32vvmanmhu:918: na cendriyārthasambandhābhāvo bādhakaḥ, asambaddhasyāpi pratyakṣatve ko
GSP32vvmanmhu:919: doṣaḥ? atiprasaṅga iti cet, tatparihārikā dṛśyānupalabdhirbhaviṣyati /
GSP32vvmanmhu:920: na ca tāvanmātrasya kāraṇatvamastīti vācyam, andhasyāpi śuklapaṭe pītatvābhāvapratītiprasaṅgāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:921: na hi pratiyogī yenaivendriyeṇa gṛhyate, tenaivāśrayo grahītavyaḥ vyomni
GSP32vvmanmhu:927: na ca duḥkhābhāva eva sukham, satyapi duḥkhe tadvyavahāradarśanāt ---
GSP32vvmanmhu:949: na ca gurutvarasavattve upādhī, ghaṭe sādhyābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:963: sa ca vegaḥ pratyakṣe dravye pratyakṣeṇaiva gṛhyate, vegena gacchatīti pratīteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:974: (1 dharmaḥ--) yāgaḥ svargotpādanasamarthāvāntaravyāpārakaḥ, anyathā yāgasvargayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvasya pratītasyānirvāhāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:975: pratīyate ca kāmanāviṣayatvena sādhyatvaṃ svargasya, vidhibalādyāgasya sādhanatvenānuṣṭheyatvam
GSP32vvmanmhu:976: na ca vācyaṃ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ kṣaṇikasya yāgasya kālāntarabhāvini svarge vināvāntaravyāpāraṃ upapadyate iti madhye 'pūrvasiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:982: kāmādhikāreṣu phalaṃ prati kāraṇasyaiva satastasya niyogaṃ prati viṣayatvābhyupagamāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:985: (3 adharmaḥ--) yo brāhmaṇāyāvagurettaṃ śatena yātayāt' (tai saṃ 2.6.10.2)
GSP32vvmanmhu:990: 1 śabdo guṇaḥ, bāhyendriyāṇāṃ madhye avayavyagrāhakeṇaiva gṛhyamāṇāyā jāteradhikaraṇatvādgandhavat
GSP32vvmanmhu:991: yadi śabdo dravyaṃ syāt, kenacidviśeṣaguṇena bhavitavyam, anyathā
GSP32vvmanmhu:994: 2 śabdo dravyaṃ sākṣādindriyasambandhena gṛhyamāṇatvādghaṭavaditi cet, na,
GSP32vvmanmhu:998: svapadasya grāhyapadasya na vyāvartanamasti adravyasya bhavatāṃ naye
GSP32vvmanmhu:1003: 3 śabdo guṇo na bhavati, śrāvaṇatvāt, śabdatvavaditi cet, na, adravyatvena hyasya samānatvāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:1005: 4 śabdo guṇaḥ, ātmavyatiriktatve sati indriyāṇāṃ madhye nityenaivādhyakṣīkṛtāyā jāteradhikaraṇatvātsukhavat
GSP32vvmanmhu:1007: na cākāśa eva vartamānatvāt, tanmahatvavaditi satpratipakṣatvam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1009: anitya śabdaḥ arasatve satyavayavyagrāhakeṇaiva gṛhyamāṇajāteradhikaraṇatvādgandhavaditi bhāṭṭaṃ prati /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1010: yacca nityaḥ śabda, ātmaviśeṣaguṇānyatve sati indriyāṇāṃ madhye nityenaiva gṛhyamāṇatvāditi, [tad] duḥkhābhāve 'naikāntikam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1011: sāmānyavattve satīti viśeṣaṇe 'pi tathā, paramate tatrāpi jāterabhyupagamāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1015: (ślo vā abhāva 9) iti prativādyanaikāntikaṃ ca, ākāśavāyusaṃyogasyāpi yogyatākaraṇagrāhyasya tathābhāvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1017: evaṃ vyavasthite pratyakṣeṇāpi sādhyate naṣṭaḥ śabda iti pratīteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1035: yadyapyekākārapratyayasya bhinneṣvekanimittamantareṇānupapadyamānatvena sāmānyasiddhiriti na yuktam, tathāvidhadarśane 'pi vipratipatteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1044: na ca sparśavattvamupādhiḥ, antyāvayavini tava vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1045: asmākaṃ tu vyāptikāle sattāpratipattau cānyatrāpi siddhiḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1050: samavāyikāraṇatvād ghaṭavat --- atra vipratipattiviṣayasyaiva tathāvidhatvānna sādhye viśeṣaṇopādānād dūṣaṇam, anyathā udghāṭitamātrameva sādhanīyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1074: (15 gandhatvam--) gandho rūpāvṛttijātimān, kevalanimittakāraṇatve sati rūpānyatvādghaṭavat
GSP32vvmanmhu:1092: (22 saṃyogatvam--) vipratipannamasamavāyikāraṇaṃ pṛthaktvāvṛttijātimat kevalanimittakāraṇavyatiriktakāraṇatve sati pṛthaktvānyatvāttadvat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1093: (23 vibhāgatvam--) vibhāgaḥ saṃyogāvṛttijātimān, saṃyogavyatiriktatve sati dvayāsamavāyikāraṇatvād dvitantukavat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1102: gomayajavṛścikaśarīrasantānavadityanumānenābrāhmaṇapūrvake kvacid brāhmaṇaśabde prāpte na brāhmaṇajanyaśarīranibandhano brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1106: nanvatra karmamātrapakṣīkāre vāyvādiṣu vyabhicāraḥ, avipratipannānāmapi pakṣīkāre karmatvāsiddhiḥ, kintvanyadeva karmavāyvoranugataṃ sāmānyaṃ syāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:1107: naivam, na hyatra paramamīṣāmekajātīyatvaṃ sādhyate, kintu guṇānāśrayotkṣepaṇatvavyatiriktajātimātram
GSP32vvmanmhu:1109: tatrākāśavṛttijātimatvāditi sādhanairatiriktajātiprasaktau tadviṣayatvenāpyasya nirvāhāt, na vāyvādiṣvatiriktānugame pramāṇamasti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1125: ākāśaśabdayośca nityasambandho bhāṭṭairabhyupagamyate, ato na sādhyavikalatā tatra saṃyogasamavāyamātre viprattipattirna dharmiṇi /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1126: apare tu saṃyogaḥ svavyatiriktasambandhādbhinnaḥ, meyatvāditi bruvate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1128: sā hi na sambandhamātre, nāpyasati sambandhe rajjughaṭayorhimavadvindhyayośca tadabhāvāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:1130: ghaṭarūpayoḥ, abhedaḥ punaḥ kaḥ syāt? bhedābhāvaḥ, tadvirodhastadanyo vā?
GSP32vvmanmhu:1132: na dvitīyaḥ, āśrayakṛtaḥ svarūpakṛtaḥ kāryakṛto vā virodhaḥ syāt, sarvathā tadvirodhānuvṛtteḥ
GSP32vvmanmhu:1133: dvitīye tu tadevāstu kimanena prathamena? tṛtīyaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1135: ghaṭarūpayoritaretarābhāvo nāstīti cet, bhedo 'sti, itaretarābhāvo nāstīti vyāhatam, tayoḥ paryāyatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1136: svarūpaṃ bhedaścet, tarhi tatpratīteḥ pratiyogisāpekṣatvaṃ durghaṭam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1138: nāpi caramaḥ, tayorhi kāryaṃ pratipattiḥ syāt, tadvyatiriktaṃ vā kiñcit?
GSP32vvmanmhu:1139: tatraiva sthitiritaraprativirodhinī tadatiriktāpekṣiṇī vā? prathame na kadācidapi tayoḥ pratipattiḥ syāt, sarvadā tadvirodhānuvṛtteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1140: dvitīye tu tāvadevāstu kimanena? tṛtīye savidāṃ janmaiva durghaṭam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1141: yadyasmādbhinnaśabdavācyam, tattadapekṣayā bhinnam, yathā ghaṭāpekṣayā ghaṭagataṃ rūpamiti
GSP32vvmanmhu:1144: na ca samavāyasyaikatve vastusaṅkaraprasaṅgaḥ, tasya samastaviśvāsaṃkaratvenaiva parikalpitatvāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:1145: na hi tasyāpratyakṣasya pūrvaṃ svabhāvo nirdhāritaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1155: yadi nāstīti pratyayavedyamāno 'pi tvayā neṣṭa iti vaktuṃ nocitam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1159: bhūtalamātravyavahārātiriktatve sati bhūtalavyavahāratvāditi mānaṃ bhūtalamiti vyavahāreṇānaikāntikam
GSP32vvmanmhu:1161: bhavati hi ghaṭatadrūpayoḥ sahopalambhe 'pi rūpaṃ ghaṭo na bhavatīti
GSP32vvmanmhu:1178: brīhīn prokṣatīti dvitīyāyāśca na tatsamavetasaṃskāravācakatvaṃ kriyājanyaphalabhāgitvaṃ ca na tatsamavāyinamākṣipati, kintu tādarthyamātram /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1179: anyathopayuktānāṃ prastarādīnāṃ homenotpādyamānaḥ saṃskāro na teṣāṃ syāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1181: na ca tatra saṃskāryatvaṃ nāsti, ``bhūtabhāvyupayogaṃ ca dravyaṃ saṃskāramarhati'' iti nyāyāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1184: (2 jñātatāyāḥ padārthāntaratvanirāsaḥ--) ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmītyatra prābhākarāṇāṃ naye jñānajanitaphalasya ghaṭe kasyacidabhāvāt tatra kathaṃ karmatvamiti cintyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1185: ata eva bhāṭṭairjñātatā 'bhyupagamyate iti cet, teṣāmapyatītānāgateṣu kā vārttā? tatrāpi jāteranuvartamānatvādadoṣa iti cet, kathaṃ tarhi vyaktau
GSP32vvmanmhu:1186: jñātatvam? tayorabhedāditi cet, na, bhedasyāpi vidyamānatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1187: bhede 'pyadoṣa iti cet, na, rasanena rasajñānamātreṇaiva tadāśrayasyāpi
GSP32vvmanmhu:1190: jñātatānabhyupagamāt kathaṃ jñānasya viṣayaniyama iti cet, jñātatāyā eva kathamāśrayaniyamaḥ? kāraṇamahimneti cet, samaḥ samādhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1201: na ca vyavahāro mānam, tasya sāmānyādisambandhatvenāpyupapatteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1202: kathaṃ tarhi sāmānye sādṛśyavyavahāraḥ, kutaḥ śyenacitaṃ cinvīta (tai saṃ
GSP32vvmanmhu:1209: na ca vivādapadaṃ sākṣātparamparayā vā prakṛtijanyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1211: na ca sukhaduḥkhamohāḥ kāraṇapūrvakāḥ, kāryatvāditi sāmpratam, saṃyogādiṣu vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1212: na ca sadutpattiparyālocanayā tatsiddhaḥ, tatraiva vivādāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1213: na ca tadarthamupādīyamānatvāt tatra sattvam, nimittakāraṇe vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1214: na ca sati kāraṇavyāpāraḥ asārthakatvāditi jātiniyamajñena vyavasthā ghaṭate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1215: yenaiva pramāṇena ghaṭabhāvasiddhistenaiva pramāṇena yogyānupalabdhyā paṭotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ tantuṣvapi paṭābhāvasiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1221: kiṃ bahunā ``parasparavirodhe hi na prakārāntarasthitiḥ'' iti nyāyāt padārthāntarāṇāṃ na sambhavaḥ, saptalakṣaṇānāṃ parasparavirodhāditi /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1223: tatra hi dravyādināṃ heyopādeyasvarūpeṇa jñāne sati saṃsārasya duḥkhabhūyastvaṃ paśyataḥ sukhamapi duḥkhānuṣaṅgādduḥkhapakṣe nikṣiptam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1224: upaniṣadā ca jñātajīvātmabrahmaṇo vaiśeṣikoktadṛśā bhagavadbhaktimanaskasya sadgurukaṭākṣapātakṣīṇāntarāyasya parameśvarasākṣātkārakutūhalino 'horātraṃ nididhyāsanamācarato
GSP32vvmanmhu:1229: na hi siddhārthe kaścitprayatate iti bhavatāmapi avidyānivṛttireva
GSP32vvmanmhu:1232: ``ānandaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ tacca mokṣe 'bhivyajyate'' iti santoṣajasukhabhiprāyeṇa gauṇyā vṛttyā duḥkhābhāvābhiprāyeṇa vā
GSP32vvmanmhu:1233: kathaṃcidguṇavāda iti, ``aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ''
GSP32vvmanmhu:1235: na ca sāṃsārikasukhābhiprāyeṇa tat, sāṃsārikasukhasyāpi brahmasukhānatiriktatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1237: atra kecit-- duḥkhaparihārārthaṃ jñānasukhayoḥ pūrvaṃ viṣayaviṣayibhāvo
GSP32vvmanmhu:1241: neha jñānamasti, viṣayaviṣayibhāvo nāstīti dṛṣṭapūrvam, jñānasya vākyenotpādakasāmagryā eva vā tadutpādakatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1245: na ca jīvā nityajñānā ātmavadīśvaravaditi sāmpratam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1248: na ca nityaviśeṣaguṇādhārā iti sādhyarthaḥ, apārthivadvyaṇukārambhakatve sati viśeṣaguṇavattvopādheḥ
